title: Mateusz Żytko - Wikipedia
content: Mateusz Żytko (born 27 November 1982 in Wrocław) is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for IV liga club Piast Żmigród, where he also serves as an assistant manager. In July 2010, he joined Polonia Bytom on a two-year contract deal.[1] In July 2011, he signed a two-year contract with Cracovia.[2]
